sense.def:
Če nekdo reče:
I will not budge on it
, si noče premisliti ali skleniti kompromisa.

seg.quote: He refuses to budge on his design principles.

sense.def:
Kadar nečesa ne moremo premakniti, lahko rečemo
it will not budge
ali
I cannot budge it
.

seg.quote: The screw just will not budge.
She could not budge the wheel.
